pr_title: Allow project name to have periods and hyphen

timeline.message: Modify tests in accordance with the changes

timeline.bodyText: If I am not wrong, this the validation we do when the user provides a package name to the init command. i.e. ballerina init <packageName>. If so, we should keep this validation.
timeline.author: azinneera

replies.bodyText: We should only be guessing the package name if the user doesnt provide a package name. i.e ballerina init
replies.author: azinneera

timeline.bodyText:

diff --git a/cli/ballerina-cli/src/main/java/io/ballerina/cli/cmd/InitCommand.java b/cli/ballerina-cli/src/main/java/io/ballerina/cli/cmd/InitCommand.java
index 449cd554f4a..fc82e57a58b 100644

+++ b/cli/ballerina-cli/src/main/java/io/ballerina/cli/cmd/InitCommand.java

@@ -122,7 +122,7 @@ public class InitCommand implements BLauncherCmd {
             if (!ProjectUtils.validatePkgName(packageName)) {
                 CommandUtil.printError(errStream,
                         "Invalid package name : '" + packageName + "' :\n" +
-                                "Package name can only contain alphanumerics, underscores and periods " +
+                                "Package name can only contain alphanumerics and underscores" +
                                 "and the maximum length is 256 characters",
                         null,
